trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around July 24th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsOn my balcony of the Montage building. I was looking up to the sky and out of nowhere a Transparent Disc Object with faint white lights around the whole body slowly moved passed the building, but I only got to see it for about 20 seconds before it vanished behind the montage moving from north to south.I have seen UFO's before but none like this one.
